column4: I have a Toshiba laptop and a tv.  Also a dvd player.  I don't have an s-video cord.  Is there another way to jerry rig  things so I can see my monitor output on my television?
aside from hooking up your VGA output to your TV or tunnel X through SSH to another computer... not really.
how would I hook up my vga output to my tv?
it only works if your TV supports VGA input (only come HDTV's have that ability)
